name: Food Tycoon
description:
Run your very own fast food restaurant! Plan your menu, set your prices, manage your employees, and climb the food chain to become a true food tycoon!

Manage your restaurants finances, supplies and public image and you could end up with hundreds of customers to serve! Are you up to the task, or will the industry dash your hopes and dreams?

Features:
- Cook burgers, French fries, hot dogs, ribs, chicken, and more!
- Run a business! Food tycoon is more than just making food.
- Manage up to 12 employees!
- Upgrade your kitchen with new equipment
- Start in a small diner and grow into a bustling restaurant!
- Add a drive-thru to your restaurant and earn more money!
- Beautiful 3d graphics
- Day and night cycles!
- 20 achievements
- No in-app purchases!
